hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select EOWT.EOWT_ID, EOWT.CREATOR, EOWT.CREATE_TIME, EOWT.MODIFIER, EOWT.MODIFY_TIME, EOWT.REC_VER, EOWT.REC_STATUS, EOWT.ORG_ID, EOWT.EOWT_CODE, EOWT.EOWT_NAME, EOWT.EOWT_NAME_EN, EOWT.EOWT_EVENT_OBJECT_CODE, EOWT.EOWT_EVENT_OBJECT_NAME, EOWT.EOWT_PROVIDER_ROLE_CODE, EOWT.EOWT_PROVIDER_ROLE_NAME, EOWT.EOWT_REMARK, EOWT.EOWT_TASK_TYPE from EO_WORK_TYPE EOWT where 1=1 <if !is_empty(eowtCode,eowtName)> and ( 1=2 <<OR EOWT.EOWT_CODE like '%' || :eowtCode || '%'>> <<OR EOWT.EOWT_NAME like '%' || :eowtName || '%'>> ) </if> <<AND EOWT.EOWT_NAME_EN like '%' || :eowtNameEn || '%'>> <<AND EOWT.EOWT_TASK_TYPE LIKE '%' || :eowtTaskType || '%'>> <<and EOWT.ORG_ID = :orgId>> <<and EOWT.EOWT_EVENT_OBJECT_CODE like '%' || :eowtEventObjectCOde || '%'>> <<and EOWT.EOWT_EVENT_OBJECT_NAME like '%' || :eowtObjectName || '%'>> <<and EOWT.EOWT_PROVIDER_ROLE_CODE like '%' || :eowtProviderRoleCode || '%'>> <<and EOWT.EOWT_PROVIDER_ROLE_NAME like '%' || :eowtProviderRoleName || '%'>> <<and EOWT.REC_STATUS = :recStatus>> order by EOWT.EOWT_CODE
